name: Japanese Festival
tagline: Chris Williams, Kayla Carr, Megan Elrod, Patrick Noble
body:
# Description
Explore the world of a Japanese festival, filled with minigames, decorative scenes, and cute squishy people! Try your hand at smashing watermelons, shooting targets, and dancing to your favorite songs to earn points. Then use those points to customize your character and buy more songs.

`TODO insert video here`

# Controls
* WASD = Move around
* Enter = Approach a booth and check out it's contents
* Move Mouse = Observe the world from a 3rd person perspective
__Each minigame has different controls which will be displayed as you start playing it__

# Libraries
* [FreeType2](http://www.freetype.org/) for text on-screen
* [OpenCV](http://opencv.org/) for playing videos
* [irrKlang](http://www.ambiera.com/irrklang/) for playing audio
* [GLFW](http://www.glfw.org/) for window and time management
* [GLEW](http://glew.sourceforge.net/) for OpenGL extension management

# Technologies Implemented
* 3rd person controllable camera
* Complex environment with rigged animation
* Collision detection by XZ radius check
* Planar shadows
* Audio playback
* Video playback
* HUD with billboarded text on-screen
